title: Penthouse Coming Soon to Nob Hill -- 2br/2.5ba
posting_body: ['Penthouse D3', 'Nob Hill Tower', '1221 Jones, San Francisco, CA, 94109', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 25', 'OR Text', '25', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Welcome to Nob Hill Tower', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1460 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Nob Hill Tower encompasses San Francisco's scenic beauty with views of the Golden Gate Bridge and Bay Bridge.", 'The surrounding neighborhood is abundant with local coffee shops, parks, and night life.', 'Cable cars are just a block away!', 'See for yourself why so many love calling Nob Hill Tower home.', 'Features', '- Dishwasher', '- Efficient Appliances', '- Window Coverings', '- Hardwood Floors', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Refrigerator', '- Large Closets', '- View', '- Cable Ready', '- Microwave', 'Community Amenities', '- Elevator', '- Garage (additional cost)', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Night Patrol', '- Package Receiving', '- Recycling', '- Fitness Center', '- Sauna', '- On-Site Management', '- Bike Racks', '- Clubhouse', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Sundeck', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Free Weights', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Rent: $75/month for dogs under 75 lbs; $100 for dogs over 75 lbs; $50/month for cats.', 'Pet rent covers two pets, i.e. if an applicant has two cats, we would only charge $50.', 'If an applicant has 2 different type of pets we only charge one pet rent which will always default to the greater amount.', '- Pet Deposit: There is a $500 deposit per pet.', 'This becomes part of the residents total security deposit and will not be refundable until the resident moves out.', '-There is a maximum of 2 pets allowed per apt if the building allows pets.', '90xeMfP3tY', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
